interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MRTREUP Hair Brush Spray Set With Detangling Wide Tooth Comb And Detanger Brush For Curly Hair With Hair Mist Spray Bottle 10oz Curl Hair Tools For Women Men Black Natural Hair 3a To 4c Hair Types
Review Date: 2022/06/09
Store: MRTREUP
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: I originally ordered this with he hopes of using this for my own thick hair, but didn't get much mileage from the brushes. The comb was good for detangling before and during my hair wash routine, but the brushes were too pliable for me to get a decent use out of them, I was just getting frustrated. Even after applying product, I was unimpressed. However, I have been using them as wig brushes and they work perfectly for finer, thinner hair types. Hands down, the mister is the best product out of the bunch. Have been using it continuously for a while now and it's worked flawlessly.
Review Title: Good for wigs. The mister is the best part.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LOVE CINEMA Curl & Volume-up Mascara 111
LOVE CINEMA
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 0.87 x 0.67 inches; 1.02 Ounces', 'UPC': '795827835224'}
The mascara does a great job. No clumping or flaking. I was able to go in with multiple coats without clumping as as I wore it throughout the day, I didn't notice any flakes on my face. I honestly didn't notice any extra lengthening or volumizing with this product though. It goes on easily though. It is one of the few mascaras that I experienced absolutely no clumping with, so I'll be a return customer just for that alone as clumping is a huge pet peeve of mine. I recommend, just don't expect miracles. It is a great mascara regardless.
Good, just nothing special
MRTREUP Hair Brush Spray Set With Detangling Wide Tooth Comb And Detanger Brush For Curly Hair With Hair Mist Spray Bottle 10oz Curl Hair Tools For Women Men Black Natural Hair 3a To 4c Hair Types
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
I originally ordered this with he hopes of using this for my own thick hair, but didn't get much mileage from the brushes. The comb was good for detangling before and during my hair wash routine, but the brushes were too pliable for me to get a decent use out of them, I was just getting frustrated. Even after applying product, I was unimpressed. However, I have been using them as wig brushes and they work perfectly for finer, thinner hair types. Hands down, the mister is the best product out of the bunch. Have been using it continuously for a while now and it's worked flawlessly.
Good for wigs. The mister is the best part.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Key Preferences:** 
  - Prefers makeup products that do not clump or flake during use.
  - Values ease of application in cosmetics.
  - Seeks reliable performance over exaggerated results, highlighting a pragmatic approach in all beauty and hair care products.

- **Trends:**
  - Demonstrates a tendency toward functional and dependable products, including hair care tools.
  - Shows loyalty to brands that consistently meet specific standards, indicating a deliberate choice based on performance.
  - Experiences disappointment with products that do not deliver as promised, reinforcing a preference for realistic expectations.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Likely to share detailed feedback on product performance, especially noting adherence to personal standards in both makeup and hair care.
  - Adopts a balanced perspective on product efficacy, recognizing strengths while candidly addressing shortcomings.
  - Willing to recommend products based on reliable performance, even if they do not exceed expectations; currently values versatility in tools, as seen in the use of hair products for alternative applications.

Overall, this user prioritizes functionality and consistency across makeup and hair care purchases while maintaining a realistic viewpoint on the capabilities of various products. Their recent experiences highlight a focus on practical utility and adaptability in chosen beauty tools.
